headline.main: Burkina Faso Director Gives African Women Authentic Voice
headline.print_headline: Burkina Faso Director Gives African Women Authentic Voice

lead_paragraph: Burkina Faso film director Apolline Woye Traore, who won three prizes at the country's prestigious Fespaco festival on Saturday, knows a thing or two about challenges.
snippet: Burkina Faso film director Apolline Woye Traore, who won three prizes at the country's prestigious Fespaco festival on Saturday, knows a thing or two about challenges....
